stories.text:
Tracsis | Remote or On-site | Full-time | Haskell / Functional programmers | Leeds, UK Tracsis are using Haskell to revolutionise UK rail operations; building high-availability, cloud-hosted systems for UK rail companies to manage everything from timetabling, through planning and on-the-day operations.

If you're passionate about Haskell, or other functional programming languages, and want to make a difference, get in touch - we've got multiple positions available at different levels, and we're always excited to hear from people who share our passion!

Tech stack includes: Haskell (Yesod, Servant), Postgres, Nginx, AWS, Vue

Apply or enquire via email to recruitment@tracsis.com

Open positions: https://tracsisops.com/careers/vacancies/
stories.title: Tracsis – Remote/On-Site – Full-Time – Haskell / FP Enthusiasts – Leeds, UK

stories.text:
Hey HN,

I launched https://buymeadomain.com - a platform where you can submit your project & an interested investor can lead your first ever round in form of "domain-name round investment".

We are launching & iterating based on the feedbacks received. Would appreciate your thoughts as well!
stories.title: Show HN: Raise your startup's first-ever round of funding in form of domain-name

stories.text: Hello folks, I'm building an online platform (https://learnly.dev) to teach people software engineering. This program's main differentiator is making is focus on problem solving, from fundamentals to practicing real world problems. I'm making it with pilot students that I monitor personally so I can adjust as needed. Please share with anyone who is starting out with their programming journey, preferably  people without technical backgrounds.
stories.title: Looking for Pilot Students to Teach
